description:
One day, unremarkable college student Yuuhi Amamiya meets a talking lizard who asks for his help saving Earth from a crisis. Before he can refuse, Yuuhi is turned into a member of the Beast Knights and given a ring that gives him the psychic power “domain control.” He is then immediately attacked by an enemy! But just as all seems lost, he’s saved by the girl next door, Samidare.

But it turns out Samidare isn’t really a savior of any kind… she’s actually a demon lord who wants to conquer Earth! Drawn to her absurd strength and evil charms, Yuuhi becomes her devoted servant and acts to support her wicked schemes.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ศึกอลวนต่างดาวป่วนโลก

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cocoa2448)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/takatsuguw)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIHIFDHvA6loFvr1GwxCITA/videos)__

__Birthplace:__ Sakura City, Chiba Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Meguro City, Tokyo, Japan

__Takatsugu Wakabayashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger, who mainly composes music for the game industry.

[Website](https://www.halftimeold.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/half_time_old) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChyuujh9rqrme-R1b2I7M0Q) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/halftimeold/)

Half time Old was formed in September 2011 in Nagoya City, Aichi. The band made a name for themselves winning a few local music competitions to perform at festivals. Appeared in large festivals "FREEDOM NAGOYA 2019" and "ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2019"

In 2020, they were in charge of the TV commercial song "Everyone is free" for the au series called "Santaro".

__Members:__

- __Masaharu Kito__ - (Vocalist & Guitarist)
- __Yuichiro Hanada__ - (Guitarist)
- __Masatoshi Uchida__ - (Bassist)
- __Nobu Hansai__ - (Drummer)

(Source: Wikipedia, MusicOfJapanBlog, halftimeold)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/guimarques78/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/guimarques78)

Guilherme Marques is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and architect.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Dickon Tarly (Game of Thrones)
- Antonio Garcia / Gold Samurai Ranger (2nd voice; Power Rangers: Samurai)
- Shisui Uchiha (Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 and Naruto X Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections)
- Mr. Phillip Frond (2nd voice - 2nd season onwards; Bob's Burgers)
- Travis Marshall (Dexter)
- Pietro Maximoff / Quiksilver (LEGO Marvel's Avengers)
- Joseph Turner (Call of Duty: WWII)
- George Takei (2nd voice; Futurama)
- Harald Fairhair (Assassin's Creed Valhalla)
- Chief (2nd dub; The Fox and the Hound)
- Amang Paso and Bantay (Trese)
- Sergeant Kong Chul-Ho (Descendants of the Sun)
- Joseph Campbell (Rick and Morty)
- Ricpon (Power Rangers Ninja Steel)
- David Hasselhoff (Close Enough)
!~

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/rodrigoomartim/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rodrigo_martim)

Rodrigo Martim is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at the DuBrasil studio.

[Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/ovictormoreno) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ovictormoreno)

Victor Moreno is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director and audio technician.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HEYSUEZO) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jallenlord/)

Affiliated with [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421) as an ADR Director.
